overrideDimlyLit.name: "Dimly Lit" Effect Override Item ID'
overrideDimlyLit.hint: Enter the ID of an effect here to use instead of the bundled "Dimly Lit" effect.

overrideInDarkness.name: "In Darkness" Effect Override Item ID
overrideInDarkness.hint: Enter the ID of an effect here to use instead of the bundled "In Darkness" effect.

delay.name: Delay (ms)
delay.hint: Delay the execution of darkness effects after a token has been moved or the lightning changes.
